item.title: Trump administration in damage-control mode after Hyundai immigration raid sparks investment concerns
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump and his administration have adopted a reconciliatory tone following an immigration raid at a South Korean-owned battery pl...

item.title: The UK is about to embrace Trump. The truth is, it needs him right now
item.description: The whirlwind trip comes at a torrid time for Prime Minister Keir Starmer who is facing questions over his leadership and judgment.

item.title: Trump sues The New York Times for $15 billion, alleging defamation and libel
item.description: Trump has initiated a flurry of defamation lawsuits against media companies, accusing them of false or misleading coverage.

item.title: Trump cannot fire Fed's Lisa Cook before FOMC meeting, appeals court rules
item.description: Trump's attorneys wanted a lower-court ruling, which temporarily barred Cook's firing, stayed ahead of the Fed's upcoming meeting on interest rates.
